# Maedix

> Instagram automation platform for auto comment replies and DMs. Meta verified provider.

Maedix helps Instagram creators and businesses automate engagement. When someone comments on a post with a trigger keyword, Maedix auto-replies to the comment and sends a follow-up DM with interactive buttons, links, or AI-powered conversations.

## Key Features

- **Visual Automation Builder**: Drag-and-drop interface to build DM conversation flows
- **Auto Comment Replies**: Instantly reply to every comment on your posts
- **Auto Follow-up DMs**: Send personalized DMs to commenters automatically
- **Keyword Triggers**: Only respond when specific words are mentioned
- **Quick Reply Buttons**: Interactive tappable buttons in DMs
- **Button Templates**: URL buttons that open links directly
- **Follower Check**: Branch automation based on follow status
- **AI Social Agents**: AI-powered conversations and data collection
- **Smart Queue**: Viral post protection — never miss a follower when posts go viral
- **Link in Bio**: Public profile page at maedix.com/@username
- **Lead Collection**: Collect name, email, phone via DM conversations

## Pricing

- **Free**: $0/month — 1 active automation, unlimited replies, visual builder, keyword triggers
- **Pro**: $1.99/month (₹49/month in India) — 5 active automations, smart queue, priority support
- **Creator**: $5.99/month (₹249/month in India) — Unlimited automations, AI social agents, auto-processing smart queue

All plans include unlimited replies per automation. No hidden fees. Cancel anytime.

## Comparison with Alternatives

- **vs ManyChat** ($15+/month): Maedix is simpler and more affordable, with a generous free plan and AI social agents included
- **vs LinkDM** ($19/month flat): Maedix offers a free tier and tiered pricing, plus AI-powered conversation agents
- **vs ReplyRush** ($19/month): Maedix provides a visual automation builder and AI social agents at lower price points
